channel.title: hypervisor on IT Talks
channel.description: Recent content in hypervisor on IT Talks

item.title: Migrate vmware vm to proxmox
item.description:
Hi. One of my clients use proxmox virtualization in Production. So I need to move one service machine created for them from vmware to proxmox. As for me the most simple way is to use VMWare Converter. Lets try.

My vm configuration on esxi.

item.title: Can’t upgrade esxi 5.5 to 6.0 due a vib conflict
item.description:
Today I tried to upgrade my standalone (not in Cluster) host (HP DL 180 G6) with esxi 6.0 and Update Manager. But when the process starts I had received this error:

The upgrade contains the following set of cpnflicting VIBs:

Mellanox_bootbank_net-mlx4-en_1.9.9.0-1OEM.550.0.0.1331820

item.title: Installing ESXi 6.0 with 4GB RAM or less
item.description: Today I want to install esxi 6.0 to my HP Microserver Gen8, which has only 4Gb of RAM. During the installation you will receive error as on screen below:

item.title: How-to receive VMware Free License to VMware ESXi
item.description:
The esxi (standalone server) is free, but it must be licensed. If not, it installs as 60 days trial, which expires after 2 month.

How-to receive and apply VMware Free License to VMware ESXi 6.0?
  1. Download the VMware Hypervisor from ****this page (you’ll need to create an account if you don’t have one – it’s free).  For esxi 5 use this page.
